hero.title: Wellness, Privacy & Trust.
hero.subtitle: We are Morocco's premier destination for intimate wellness products. We believe sexual health should be accessible, safe, and judgment-free.

private.title: 100% Private
private.description: Your data is encrypted. We never sell your information. Your order history is strictly personal.

discreet.title: Discreet Delivery
discreet.description: Delivered in standard opaque packaging. The label is generic. Even the courier doesn't know the contents.

authentic.title: Authentic Brands
authentic.description: Authorized retailer for Durex, Manix, and other top global brands. No counterfeits, ever.

process.title: How our discreet delivery works
process.subtitle: We understand your privacy is priority #1. Here is exactly what happens with your order.

step1.title: Neutral Packaging
step1.description: Your items are packed in a standard box or opaque pouch. No 'Intimacy Wellness' logo, no external imagery.

step2.title: Generic Label
step2.description: The sender is displayed as 'IW Logistics' or a generic logistics name. Contents are declared as 'Personal Care' or 'Accessories'.

step3.title: Private Delivery
step3.description: The courier hands you the sealed package. We support Cash on Delivery (COD) so you can pay discreetly upon receipt.

q1.question: Can the courier see what's inside?
q1.answer: Absolutely not. The package is sealed before leaving our warehouse. The courier has no information about the contents.

q2.question: What appears on my bank statement?
q2.answer: If you pay online (coming soon), it will appear as 'IW Store'. However, we primarily use Cash on Delivery (COD), so no bank trail.

q3.question: Do you sell to minors?
q3.answer: No. We sell strictly to adults 18+. By using our site, you confirm you are of legal age.

hero.title: Understand & Act
hero.subtitle: Clear answers, validated by AI and our experts.
